text: Te Aroha () is a rural town in the Waikato, New Zealand and is located on State Highway 26. It is 53 kilometers northeast of Hamilton and 50 kilometers of Thames. It is on the foot of the Kaimai Ranges. It has two primary schools, one high school and one Catholic primary school located within the town. ==References== Category:Towns in Waikato Category:Matamata-Piako District
title: Te Aroha
